title: 右键
author: qweshen
txt_content: 如题，能不能手持某个有NBT标签的物品右键执行某个指令，或者手持一段时间后执行指令

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-474463-1-1.html

scoreboard players add @a 记分板名 1 {SelectedItem:{id:minecraft:物品名称,Damage:数据值/损伤值,Count:数量}}
